remarks: The trace of a lattice translation is not equal to any atom not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` .  Part of proof of Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
trlne.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlne.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlne.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlne.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlne.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlne $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> P =/= ( R ` F ) ) $.
